item.title: Testing Typescript Api With Jest and Supertest
item.description: We are going to be using the very simple TypeScript API we developed in a previous tutorial in order to learn about Jest Testing. In this tutorial, we’ll be looking at how you can get a very simple test framework up and running for your TypesScript based API using the jest and supertest testing libraries. Installation Now that we have gotten the why? out of the way, let’s see how we can go about implementing our own testing framework:
